meetings.body:
***SFRRI Award Lectures***

**SFRRI Trevor Slater Co-Awards**

* [Prof. Michael Davies](https://researchprofiles.ku.dk/en/persons/michael-j-davies) (University of Copenhagen, Denmark)
* [Prof. Giovanni E. Mann](https://www.kcl.ac.uk/people/giovanni-e-mann) (King's College London, UK)



**SFRRI Lester Packer Award**

* [Prof. Giuseppe Poli](https://medchirurgiasl.campusnet.unito.it/do/docenti.pl/Alias?giuseppe.poli#tab-profilo) (University of Torino, Italy)



**SFRRI Alberto Boveris Award**

* [Prof. Enrique Cadenas](https://profiles.sc-ctsi.org/enrique.cadenas) (University of Southern California, USA)



**SFRRI Kelvin & Joanna Davies Rising Star Award**

* [Dr. Carlos Henríquez-Olguín](https://researchprofiles.ku.dk/en/persons/carlos-henriquez-olguín) (University of Copenhagen, Denmark)
meetings.meeting_title: 22nd Society for Free Radical Research International Biennial Meeting
32nd Meeting of The Society for Redox Research Australasia and 11th Joint Meeting with The Society for Free Radical Research Japan
meetings.location: Finkel Lecture Theatre, John Curtin School of Medical Research, 131 Garran Rd, Acton ACT 2601
